title: Work it out (Captioned)
brief_description: A video, aimed at young women between the ages of 14-20 years, that examines career opportunities available. The subject areas covered include : Women at Work; Careers Counselling; Equal Opportunity; Personal Development; Industrial relations; Social Studies.
